meta.siteDescription: AI consulting that turns ideas into working systems. Training, automations, and strategy for small businesses, startups, and professional services.

home.headline: AI consulting that turns ideas into working systems
home.subheadline: We help organizations adopt artificial intelligence with clarity, purpose, and measurable outcomes ‚Äî no unnecessary complexity, no wasted investment.
home.credibility: IT-focused AI consultant specializing in practical adoption and automation.
home.whoWeHelp: Small & local businesses, startups, professional services

servicesSummary.title: Training
servicesSummary.description: Hands-on AI training tailored to your team's skill level and business context.

servicesSummary.title: Automations
servicesSummary.description: Design and implement AI-powered workflows that reduce manual effort and errors.

servicesSummary.title: AI Strategy
servicesSummary.description: Develop a clear, actionable roadmap for integrating AI into your operations.

howWeWork.title: Discovery
howWeWork.description: We begin with a focused assessment of your current operations, goals, and readiness for AI adoption.

howWeWork.title: Strategy
howWeWork.description: We develop a tailored plan that identifies the highest-impact opportunities for AI in your business.

howWeWork.title: Implementation
howWeWork.description: We execute the plan ‚Äî training your team, building automations, and ensuring everything works in practice.

howWeWork.title: Support
howWeWork.description: We provide ongoing guidance to help you refine, scale, and sustain your AI capabilities.

home.ctaText: Ready to get started? Reach out today.

about.bio: Jose Martinez is an IT-focused AI consultant who helps organizations move from curiosity about artificial intelligence to confident, practical adoption. With a background in information technology and a focus on real-world application, Jose works with business leaders and teams to identify where AI creates genuine value ‚Äî and then helps them capture it.
about.bioExtended: JM AI Consulting operates on a simple principle: technology should serve the business, not the other way around. Every engagement is built around your specific context, goals, and constraints. There are no one-size-fits-all solutions here.
about.workingStyle: All consulting is delivered remotely, with clear communication, structured timelines, and full transparency at every stage. Whether the engagement involves a single training session or a multi-phase strategy rollout, clients receive the same level of thoroughness and professionalism.

focusPoints.title: Training & Enablement
focusPoints.description: Helping teams understand AI tools and techniques so they can operate with confidence and independence.

focusPoints.title: Automation Design
focusPoints.description: Identifying repetitive tasks and manual bottlenecks, then designing AI-powered workflows to address them.

focusPoints.title: Strategic Planning
focusPoints.description: Developing clear roadmaps for AI adoption that align with business goals and available resources.

about.industries: JM AI Consulting works with small and local businesses, startups, and professional services firms across a range of industries ‚Äî including legal, healthcare administration, real estate, financial services, and retail.

services.intro: JM AI Consulting offers three core service areas, each designed to help your organization adopt AI with clarity and confidence. All services are delivered remotely and tailored to your specific needs.

items.title: AI Training & Enablement
items.description: Practical, hands-on training designed to bring your team up to speed on AI tools, workflows, and best practices ‚Äî without the jargon.
bullets: Customized training sessions for teams of any skill level
Tool-specific instruction (e.g., large language models, automation platforms, data analysis tools)
Workshops on prompt engineering, responsible AI use, and evaluating AI outputs
Follow-up resources and reference materials for continued learning
deliverables: Custom reference guides and cheat sheets

items.title: Automation Design & Implementation Support
items.description: We identify your most time-consuming manual processes and design AI-powered automations to handle them ‚Äî accurately and at scale.
bullets: Process audit to identify automation opportunities
Workflow design using AI and integration platforms
Documentation and handoff for internal maintenance
deliverables: Process audit report with prioritized recommendations

items.title: AI Strategy
items.description: A structured engagement to help you define where AI fits in your organization ‚Äî and build a realistic plan to get there.
bullets: Phased adoption roadmap with clear milestones
deliverables: AI Strategy Report with executive summary

services.ctaText: Interested in working together? Get in touch to discuss your needs.

contact.intro: JM AI Consulting is available for new engagements. All consulting is delivered remotely. To discuss your needs and explore how we can help, please reach out via email.
contact.templateBody:
Hello Jose,

I'm reaching out to discuss a potential AI consulting engagement.

‚Ä¢ Company/Organization: [Name]
‚Ä¢ Industry: [Your industry]
‚Ä¢ Area of interest: [Training / Automation / Strategy / Other]
‚Ä¢ Brief description: [A few sentences about what you're looking to accomplish]
‚Ä¢ Preferred timeline: [Any relevant dates or deadlines]

I look forward to hearing from you.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
